00026 class bgui_histogram_tableau : public vgui_tableau

00028  public:
00029   //: Constructor takes all the labels used on the graph.

00031   //: Destructor.

00036   //: Return the name of this tableau.
00037   vcl_string type_name() const { return "bgui_histogram_tableau";}
00038   //: Handles all events for this tableau.
00039   bool handle(const vgui_event&);
00040   //: Clear the data
00041   void clear();
00042  private:
